SELECT g.gname as gname, g.id as gid, m.mesh_id as meshId, ifnull(m.mesh_name,m.mesh_id) as mname, flag FROM t_group g JOIN t_mesh_group mg ON g.id = mg.gid right JOIN t_mesh m ON mg.mid = m.id
g.id=#{gid}

SELECT id, CASE WHEN STATUS = '1' THEN '在线' WHEN STATUS = '0' THEN '离线' END AS state, if( name is null or name='', mac ,name) AS pname, mac, product_type as productType, ota_version as otaVersion, #{meshId} as meshId FROM t_host_info WHERE id IN (SELECT hm.hid FROM t_host_mesh hm,t_mesh m WHERE m.id = hm.mid AND m.mesh_id = #{meshId})
SELECT hi.is_master as master, hi.status FROM t_host_mesh hm right JOIN t_host_info hi ON hm.hid = hi.id WHERE hm.mid = ( SELECT id FROM t_mesh WHERE mesh_id = #{meshId} )

SELECT id, tname, tid, mesh_id AS meshId, IF( repetition = '0', '不重复', '重复' ) repetition, dayObj, IF( item_set = '1', '启用', '停用' ) itemSet, WEEK FROM f_time_line WHERE mesh_id = #{meshId} order by tid

SELECT tsid, concat(IF( LENGTH( HOUR ) = 1, CONCAT( '0', HOUR ), HOUR ), ':',IF( LENGTH( MINUTE ) = 1, concat( '0', MINUTE ), MINUTE ) ) AS time, scene_id FROM f_time_point WHERE tsid = #{tsid} order by time
